Class Login

java.lang.Object
controller.Login

javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Login extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Login screen

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the Login controller
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location/url for the fxml file
      resourceBundle - used for translating between languages

    • login

      public void login(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      calls method to check credentials, logs the attempt with timestamp, and goes to landing screen if valid credentials
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - from the "login" button
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found
      SQLException - if there is a problem retrieving the password and username due to SQL errors

    • toLanding

      public void toLanding(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates to the landing page
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed from other methods
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found

    • exitProgram

      public void exitProgram()
      Exits the program - static to allow other controllers to use it
